## Problem 2

Read the data stored in 'suites_dw_Table1.txt' to R, without changing the data

```{r}
library(tidyverse) # Loading needed functions

raw_file <- readLines(con = "suites_dw_Table1.txt") # Read the data into memory

substr(x = raw_file,start = 1,stop = 2) # Identify the line number L of the separator line between the column names and
# the rest of the data table.

L <- # Save the result in memory
  (substr(x = raw_file, start = 1, stop = 2) == "--") %>%
  which() %>%
  min()

cat(raw_file[1:(L-2)], sep = "\n", file = "variable_description.txt")
# Create a text file to store the result

variable_names <- 
  str_split(string = raw_file[L-1], pattern = "\\|") %>% 
  unlist() %>% 
  str_trim()

comma_separated_values <- 
  raw_file[15:length(raw_file)] %>% 
  gsub("\\|", ",", .) %>% 
  gsub(" ", "", .)

comma_separated_values_with_names <- 
  c(paste(variable_names, collapse = ","),
    comma_separated_values)    

cat(comma_separated_values_with_names, sep = "\n", file = "updated_file.txt")

galaxies <- read_csv("updated_file.txt")

```
